data.title: Bitcoin Is Set for First Yearly Split From Stocks in a Decade
data.description: The S&P 500 has climbed more than 16% in 2025, while Bitcoin is down 3% — the first time since 2014 that stocks have rallied while the token is down, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.
data.keywords: Bitcoin,Stocks,S&P 500 INDEX,Cryptocurrency,Donald John Trump,White House,Regulation,Retail,Chief Executive Officer,Environment,markets,crypto,business,cryptocurrencies
